name: Jimmy's Rewind Adventures
description:
My game for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2.

This is a platformer-like 2D shooter. You are helping Jimmy, whose rewind buttons have been stolen, to return them so he can watch his favorite movies again.

I haven't been able to test the game for Linux or Mac, but the Windows download sure works. The game isn't heavy nor is it performance demanding, pretty much everyone can run it at max graphics.

Also, the WebGL version wouldn't load in my browser, but I think everything should work for you.

The WebGL version has been fixed and works for everyone.

This is my first Game Jam so I'm sorry if there are problems in the game that I didn't encounter, but I think there are none.

Have fun, and, constructive criticism is always welcome.

Controls:

A, D - Move left, right

W or Space - Jump

Mouse movement -  aim

LMB - Shoot

Esc twice - Go back to the main menu

Credits(they're in game too):

Blow font - Robert Borenic

Tileset - https://miguelsgp.itch.io/

Music - Neural Composer by CodeParade

Sound effects - sfxr

Everything else - Me (SoMir)
